title: Add Correlation Stream Evaluator
description:
The Correlation Evaluator computes the Pearson's product-moment correlation of two columns of data.

Syntax:

let(a=expr, 
    b=expr, 
    c=col(a, fieldName), 
    d=col(b, fieldName), 
    tuple(corr=corr(c,d)))

comments.content: Made the test case more robust
